bibl.title: The Triad of Osiris, Isis, and Harpocrates in Ptolemaic Egypt.

When the Greeks Ruled Egypt: from Alexander the Great to Cleopatra. Institute for the Study of the Ancient World at New York University, October 8, 2014 - January 4, 2015, Art Institute of Chicago, October 31, 2013 - July 27, 2014. With contributions by Mary C. Greuel, Roger S. Bagnall, Dee L. Clayman, R.C.-K. & Olaf E. Kaper.

bibl.seg: Olaf E. Kaper, The Triad of Osiris, Isis, and Harpocrates in Ptolemaic Egypt.

Roberta Casagrande-Kim (ed.), When the Greeks Ruled Egypt: from Alexander the Great to Cleopatra. Institute for the Study of the Ancient World at New York University, October 8, 2014 - January 4, 2015, Art Institute of Chicago, October 31, 2013 - July 27, 2014 (Princeton - Oxford, 2014) pp. 72-86, 14 figg. coul.
